summary: Comprehensive testing of The Local Jewel admin system including all backend APIs, admin UI functionality, and regression testing of existing wizard flow

integration_issues.issue: Admin session appears to have short expiration time, frequently redirects to login
integration_issues.impact: Requires frequent re-authentication during admin usage

design_issues.issue: React hydration warnings in console for table and form elements

passed_tests: Admin Login: POST /api/admin/auth/login works with admin@thelocaljewel.com / TLJadmin2024!
Admin Authentication: GET /api/admin/me returns admin details
Analytics Overview: GET /api/admin/analytics/overview returns lead counts and metrics
Analytics Funnel: GET /api/admin/analytics/funnel returns event tracking data
Analytics Sources: GET /api/admin/analytics/sources returns lead attribution data
Admin Leads List: GET /api/admin/leads returns paginated leads with search/filter support
Admin Lead Detail: GET /api/admin/leads/{id} returns lead with quotes and orders
Admin Lead Status Update: PATCH /api/admin/leads/{id} updates lead status successfully
Admin Add Note: POST /api/admin/leads/{id}/notes adds internal notes to leads
Admin Create Quote: POST /api/admin/leads/{id}/quotes creates quotes and updates lead status
Admin Orders: GET /api/admin/orders returns orders list with pagination
Admin Settings GET/PATCH: Site settings management working correctly
Admin Tracking GET/PATCH: Tracking pixel configuration working
Admin Tracking Verify: Event verification API returns tracking data
CSV Export: GET /api/admin/leads/export.csv returns proper CSV format
Public Settings: GET /api/settings/public returns settings without authentication
Admin UI Login: /admin/login page loads and login form works
Admin UI Navigation: Successfully navigates between /admin, /admin/leads pages
Admin UI Leads Data: Displays 12 leads with proper data (names, phones, products, status, dates)
Admin UI Authentication: Properly redirects to login when not authenticated
Customer Wizard Landing: Main page loads with proper CTA button and social proof
Customer Wizard Social Proof: GIA/IGI badges, 4.7 stars (70+ reviews), 100+ customers, $5K savings displayed

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (admin UI functional, minor session timeout issues)
